# Problem 2

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")
rest_inspec %>% 
  group_by(boro, grade) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  spread(key = grade, value = n)
```

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(grade != is.na(grade)) %>% 
  separate(grade_date, into = c("grade_year", "grade_month_day"), sep = "\\-") %>%
  mutate(
    grade_month_day=str_replace(grade_month_day, "\\-","")
  )

```
